message.content:
To achieve this, you can use the following formula in LibreOffice Calc:
```
=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")
```
In this formula, `A1` is the source cell that contains text with single quotes. The `SUBSTITUTE()` function replaces all occurrences of a specified character (in this case, `'`) with another character (in this case, an empty string `""`).
